msContents.summary: A palm leaf manuscript containing the first five adhyāyas of the Āśvalāyanaśrautasūtra (ff. 1-57).

msItem.title: Āśvalāyanaśrautasūtra (adhyāya 1-5)
msItem.rubric: śubham astu || śrīgurubhyo namaḥ hariḥ oṃ ||
msItem.incipit:
athaitasya samāmnāyasya vitāne yogāpattiṃ vakṣyāmo gnyādheyaprabhṛtīny āha vaitānikāni darśapūrṇamāsau tu pūrvaṃ vyākyāsyāmas taṃtrasya tatrāmnātatvād adarśapūrṇamā
sayor haviḥṣv āsaṃneṣu hotāmaṃtritaḥ prāgudag āhavanīyād avasthāya prānmukho yajñopavīty ācamya dakṣiṇāvṛdvihāraṃ prapadyate pūrveṇotkaram apareṇa praṇītā idhmam apareṇāpraṇīte cātvā
laṃ cātvālavatsv
msItem.explicit:
teṣu savaneṣu | stotram agre śastrāt | parāṅadhvaryāvateti | ṛtu yājaiś caraṃti | etasmin kāle prapadyācchāvākaḥ | aindra vāyavam uttarārdhe gṛhītvā | dvidevatyaiś caraṃti | athaindraiḥ puroḷāśair a
nusavanam caraṃti | atha savanīyena paśunā caraṃti | upāṃśuṃ hūyamānaṃ | parihite payiṣya hotar ity uktaḥ | parihite saṃsthiteṣu daśa ||—||

msItem.title: Āgneṇeṣṭi
msItem.incipit: asya iṣṭeḥ saptadaśasāmidhenyaḥ vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau || agnir iṃdrāgnī viśvedevāḥ somo dyāvā pṛthivī va pradhānadevatāḥ |

msItem.title: Āgrayaṇa
msItem.incipit: śarady āgrayaṇaṃ | śaratkāle amāvāsyāyāṃ paurṇimāsyāṃ vā prātar agnihotraṃ hutvā āgrayaṇena yajñye |
msItem.explicit:
dvau mantrau sarve bhakṣāṇāṃ mantravatāṃ pratyāmnāyu brāmhaṇabhojanāṃtaṃ ||—hariḥ oṃ ||—||—||
gharme kapālam upacinvanti vedhasaḥ | pūṣṇas tāny api vrata indravāyū vimuñcatām | agniḥ prathamaḥ prāśnātu sa hi veda yathā haviḥ | śivā asmabhyam oṣadhīḥ kṛṇotu viśvacarṣaṇiḥ|| bhadrāṃna śreyaḥ—tanuve syonaḥ ||—||

extent.measure: 1 guard folio inserted at the beginning and 1 guard folio at the end of the bundle, 62 folios (numbered 1-57, with no. 36 assigned twice, and 4 folios numbered 1-4 at the end)

supportDesc.foliation: Nandināgarī numerals, on the left margin of the recto, 1 to 57, with no. 36 repeated twice on successive folios. The last four folios are numbered 1-4 on the right margin of the recto.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation, ff. 1r-9v are inked, ff. 10-57 and 1-2r are uninked; ff. 2v-4r are inked.
